doc.title: Beyond Blood
doc.plot: Beyond Blood is an Australian epic crime, drama film. Benjamin Brennan left home as a troubled teen where on the gritty streets he meets two Vietnamese brothers, Michael and Gabriel Trung. From then on the three youths were inseparable. Living a life of crime, drugs and violence, the three conquered the streets striking fear and crushing all those in their way. Revered by many by their sense of loyalty, honor and ruthlessness - their legacy was unstoppable. A turning point in Benjamin's life as he realizes that there must be more to life than being a thug as the senseless violence overwhelms him. This night will change their lives forever.
